com.ece.superkids

Class FileManagerImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ece.superkids.FileManagerImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FileManager

    public class FileManagerImpl
extends Object
implements FileManager
    The FileManagerImpl allows access to the custom files stored on the local file system in the user's home directory. This class is created in a singleton pattern.
    Author:
    Ben Duong
     

    • Method Summary

      Get the path to the file holding the custom image path key-value pairs.

      Get the directory where the custom images are stored.
